availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Requisitions for the Return of Fugitives from Justice, 1859-1861

body.p:
STATE OF NEW YORK.
Executive Department.
Albany, July 5th 1861
Sir:

I am directed by Governor Morgan to ask of you copies of any rules established by you respecting the granting of requisitions for the extradition of persons charged with being fugitives from justice. He also directed me to enclose herewith copies of the regulations of this Department relative to the form of application for requisitions on other States.

I have the honor to be
Yr. Excellency's Obt Servt
L. L. Doty
Private Secretary
